text:
Welcome to PonziLand!

I'm Lazi, and I'll be your guide. Let's learn the basics together!
That highlighted land is owned by a player. Click on it to see its details.

This info panel shows everything about the land.

Hover over each field to learn what it means!
Want more details? Click the eye icon to switch to Pro Mode!
Pro Mode shows the full token breakdown - see exactly where your earnings come from each neighbor!
Now let's buy a land! Click the BUY LAND button to open the purchase menu.
continue: Click on the BUY LAND button

text:
Set a price that makes sense - you want to earn more from neighbors than you pay in taxes!

Click Buy Now when you're happy with it.

Nice! You now own a land!

See that construction site? That's an auction - another way to get land. Click on it!

Auction prices start high and decrease over time.

Buy before it gets too cheap - or someone else will grab it!
You can see how long each land has before it gets nuked! Hover on the top bar and click the shield icon.

Uh oh! Your land's stake is running low and it will be nuked soon!

Open the info panel to add more stake.
Use Increase Stake to add more funds. This extends how long your land survives!
Look! A neighbor's land is about to be nuked! Click the golden coin above your land to claim your taxes - this will trigger the neighbor's nuke!

You've got the basics! Remember:

- Set prices to stay profitable
- Keep your stake topped up
- Watch for cheap auctions
- Claim nuked lands for rewards!

Good luck in PonziLand!
